name: Mt4j-components
tagline: Component Development and sharder support â€“ implemented in Java and C++.
body:
The purpose of this framework is to initiate the creation of frameworks in different languages, where the frameworks in different languages have some level of similarity in their API and Designs.

Originally hosted [here](http://nuicode.com/projects/jux)
*** GSoC 2011 project
[![GSoC 2011](http://db.tt/JHJQ8Itn)](http://www.google-melange.com/gsoc/homepage/google/gsoc2011)
**Student:** Amit Kumar Sarangi
**Mentor:** Christopher Ruff
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
